comment: Fantastic service! Fixed my overheating engine quickly and explained everything clearly. Very professional.
Sorted out my gearbox grinding issue. Took a bit longer than expected but the result was great. Fair price too.
BrakeMaster were brilliant. Replaced all four pads and bled the brakes. Car stops perfectly now. Highly recommend.
Good garage, diagnosed my electrical fault within the hour. Could improve on communication but work quality was solid.
Quick and easy slow puncture repair. Done in 20 minutes while I waited. Great value and friendly staff.
Got the job done with the brake pads but reception was a bit unhelpful and I had to chase for updates.
West London AC were incredible. Fixed my heating matrix the same day. Car is warm and cozy again. Can't fault them.
Battery replaced and charging system checked thoroughly. Good technical knowledge and honest pricing.
Islington Engine & Transmission identified the cold-start knock as a worn timing chain. Fixed it properly. Excellent work.
New tyres fitted promptly. They also flagged a wheel alignment issue I wasn't aware of. Very thorough inspection.
Camden Electrical ran a full diagnostic scan and cleared the fault. Very knowledgeable team and reasonable rates.
Absolutely stunning respray job. You'd never know the car had been keyed. Paint match was perfect.
Automatic transmission service sorted the slipping completely. Clear explanation of what was done. Will return.
ABS sensor replaced but I had to wait two days for the part. Workshop could be better organised.
Lewisham Climate diagnosed a loose compressor bracket rattling against the AC housing. Fixed quickly and cheaply!
Hammersmith Brake replaced a seized caliper and both front pads. Braking is now perfectly straight and smooth.
Croydon Comprehensive cleaned the fuel injectors and replaced the MAF sensor. Acceleration is sharp again.
Window motor replaced in both front doors. Had to leave car overnight but result was great. Recommend for electrics.
Sorted the blowout damage, fitted two new tyres and ran a full alignment check. Very professional and efficient.
Finchley Prestige sent a technician to my roadside location within 40 minutes. Oil pump replaced. Literally saved my engine.
Used BrakeMaster on a second visit for rear brakes. Consistent quality and honest assessment every time.
Engine misfire eventually fixed after two visits. First diagnosis was incorrect but they didn't charge for the return trip.
West London AC recharged the refrigerant and replaced a faulty expansion valve. AC is ice cold now. Perfect service.
Mobile tyre team arrived within 35 minutes to fix my flat on the roadside. Absolute lifesavers. Will always use them.
Clutch replacement was done in a day. Smooth engagement now and a fair price given the labour involved.
Paddington Road Recovery towed my car without any fuss. Arrived on time and handled the car with care.
Greenwich Full Service completed a full service and MOT prep. Identified worn tyres and a leaking coolant hose before they became problems.
Vauxhall AC & Bodywork repaired the door dent and touched up the paint. Very tidy finish and good value.
Windscreen replacement was fine but scheduling was frustrating. Took three days to get an appointment.
Ilford Multi-Service replaced both rear door actuators. Works perfectly now. Friendly and knowledgeable staff.
